network.loading: 根据网络规模和链接质量，这可能需要一些时间。
network.copy_paste_on: 将以下数据复制并粘贴到可用的在线查看器/编辑器中。
network.highlight_info: 点击设备图像以自动高亮显示。
network.legend_node_siblings: 仅显示评级最高的兄弟节点，这应该大致匹配网络的实际连接。
network.legend_node_size: 节点按中心性调整大小。
network.legend_node_select: 选择一个节点将选择网络的相关一跳部分。
network.legend_node_fold: 节点上下文菜单的折叠/展开按钮将影响网络的相关部分。
network.legend_edge_toggle: 切换关系边将改变布局。禁用一个或多个时，网络的实际布局不再准确表示。
network.begin_info_type: The type is used to retrieve a different network map format. 外部 ones are meant to be copied for use outside of the frontend (some example websites are given once generated).
network.begin_info_routes: 启用路由将从设备检索路由表（并非所有协调器/设备都支持此功能，但失败不应阻止其余数据加载）。这目前仅在'数据'显示中使用。
network.begin_info_display: 显示类型允许在面向数据的视图和地图视图之间切换。

ota.update_selected_info: OTA 更新对网络负担很重。确保网络稳定，选择使用较少的时间进行更新。
ota.empty_ota_message: 当前没有设备支持 OTA
ota.schedule_info: 将在设备下次 OTA 请求时更新

settings.donation_text: 在这里您可以感谢我们所有的辛勤工作。也请毫不犹豫地说些好话 ;)
settings.translation_prompt: 您可以在以下网址帮助翻译
settings.frontend_notice: 这些设置存储在您的浏览器本地。使用隐私窗口或清除缓存将重置为默认值。

health.interview_info: 设备访谈可能会严重影响此数据。

zigbee.force_remove_notice: 仅作为最后手段使用（不会传播到网络）
zigbee.network_address_hex: 十六进制格式的网络地址
zigbee.network_address_dec: 十进制格式的网络地址
zigbee.update_Home_assistant_entity_id: 更新 Home Assistant entity ID
zigbee.read_write_attributes: 读取 / Write attributes from endpoint cluster

devConsole.state_property_info: 将结果设置到设备状态（仅限读取）
devConsole.mqtt_topic_info: 省略 'base_topic'，前端消息通过 WebSocket 直接发送到 Zigbee2MQTT。
devConsole.add_update_external_extension: 添加 or update external extension
devConsole.add_update_external_converter: 添加 or update external converter
devConsole.codespace_info: A Github 代码space is available to help in development

settingsSchemaDescriptions.homeassistant: Home Assistant 集成（MQTT 发现）
settingsSchemaDescriptions.homeassistant-enabled: 启用 Home Assistant 集成
settingsSchemaDescriptions.homeassistant-legacy_action_sensor: Home Assistant legacy actions sensor, when enabled a action sensor will be discoverd and an empty `action` will be send after every published action.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.homeassistant-experimental_event_entitie: Home Assistant experimental event entities, when enabled Zigbee2MQTT will add event entities for exposed actions. The events and attributes are currently deemed experimental and subject to change.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability: 检查设备是否在线/离线
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-active: 活跃设备选项（路由器/主电源供电）
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-active-timeout: Time after which an active device will be marked as offline in 分钟
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-active-max_jitter: 最大imum jitter (in msec) allowed on timeout to avoid availability pings trying to trigger around the same time
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-active-backoff: Enable timeout backoff on failed availability pings (x1.5, x3, x6, x12...)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-active-pause_on_backoff_gt: Pause availability pings when backoff reaches over this limit until a new Zigbee message is received from the device. A value of zero disables pausing.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-passive: 被动设备选项（主要是电池供电）
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-passive-timeout: Time after which an passive device will be marked as offline in 分钟
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-base_topic: Zigbee2MQTT MQTT 消息的基础主题
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-server: MQTT 服务器 URL（使用 mqtts:// 进行 SSL/TLS 连接）
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-ca: 用于签署服务器和客户端证书的 CA 的 SSL/TLS 证书的绝对路径
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-key: 用于客户端身份验证的 SSL/TLS 密钥的绝对路径
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-cert: 用于客户端身份验证的 SSL/TLS 证书的绝对路径
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-reject_unauthorized: 禁用自签名 SSL 证书
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-include_device_information: 在 MQTT 消息中包含设备信息
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-force_disable_retain: Disable retain for all send messages. ONLY enable if your MQTT broker doesn't support retained message (e.g. AWS IoT core, Azure IoT Hub, Google Cloud IoT core, IBM Watson IoT Platform). Enabling will break the Home Assistant integration
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-maximum_packet_size: Specifies the maximum allowed packet length (in bytes) that the server can send to Zigbee2MQTT. NOTE: The same value exists in your MQTT broker but for the length the client can send to it instead.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.serial-port: Location of the adapter. To autodetect the port, set null
settingsSchemaDescriptions.serial-disable_led: 如果支持，禁用适配器的 LED
settingsSchemaDescriptions.serial-adapter: 适配器类型，除非遇到问题，否则不需要
settingsSchemaDescriptions.serial-baudrate: Baud rate speed for the serial port. This must match what the firmware on your adapter supports (most commonly 115200).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.serial-rtscts: 串口的 RTS / CTS 硬件流控制
settingsSchemaDescriptions.blocklist: 阻止设备接入网络（通过 ieeeAddr）
settingsSchemaDescriptions.passlist: Allow only certain devices to join the network (by ieeeAddr). Note that all devices not on the passlist will be removed from the network!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ota-update_check_interval: Your device may request a check for a new firmware update. This value determines how frequently third party servers may actually be contacted to look for firmware updates. The value is set in minutes, and the default is 1 day.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ota-disable_automatic_update_check: Zigbee devices may request a firmware update, and do so frequently, causing Zigbee2MQTT to reach out to third party servers. If you disable these device initiated checks, you can still initiate a firmware update check manually.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ota-zigbee_ota_override_index_location: Location of override OTA index file
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ota-image_block_response_delay: Limits the rate of requests (in milliseconds) during OTA updates to reduce network congestion. You can increase this value if your network appears unstable during OTA.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ota-default_maximum_data_size: The size of file chunks sent during an update (in bytes). Note: This value may get ignored for manufacturers that require specific values.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-port: Frontend binding port. Ignored when using a unix domain socket
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-host: Frontend binding host. Binds to a unix socket when an absolute path is given instead.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-auth_token: 启用身份验证，默认禁用
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-url: URL on which the frontend can be reached, currently only used for the Home Assistant device configuration page
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-ssl_cert: SSL Certificate file path for exposing HTTPS. The sibling property 'ssl_key' must be set for HTTPS to be activated.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-ssl_key: SSL key file path for exposing HTTPS. The sibling property 'ssl_cert' must be set for HTTPS to be activated.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-base_url: Base URL for the frontend. If hosted under a subpath, e.g. 'http://localhost:8080/z2m', set this to '/z2m'
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-notification_filter: 隐藏匹配指定正则表达式字符串的前端通知。示例：'z2m: Failed to ping.*'
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-disable_ui_serving: 如果为 true，则不提供前端 UI，Zigbee2MQTT 只维护 WebSocket（您需要根据需要自己提供独立的 UI）。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_symlink_current: 在日志目录中创建指向当前日志的符号链接
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_output: 日志输出位置，留空以抑制日志记录
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_file: 日志文件名，也可以包含时间戳
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_namespaced_levels: 为特定命名空间设置单独的日志级别
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_debug_to_mqtt_frontend: 将调试级别记录到 MQTT 和前端（可能会降低整体性能）
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_debug_namespace_ignore: Do not log these namespaces (regex-based) for debug level
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_directories_to_keep: Number of log directories to keep before deleting the oldest one
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-host: The host running syslogd, defaults to localhost.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-port: The port on the host that syslog is running on, defaults to syslogd's default port.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-protocol: The network protocol to log over (e.g. tcp4, udp4, tls4, unix, unix-connect, etc).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-path: The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e. /dev/log or /var/run/syslog for OS X).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-pid: PID of the process that log messages are coming from (Default process.pid).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-localhost: Host to indicate that log messages are coming from (Default: localhost).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-type: The type of the syslog protocol to use (Default: BSD, also valid: 5424).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-app_name: The name of the application (Default: Zigbee2MQTT).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-eol: The end of line character to be added to the end of the message (Default: Message without modifications).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-pan_id: ZigBee pan ID, changing requires re-pairing all devices!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-ext_pan_id: Zigbee extended pan ID, changing requires re-pairing all devices!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-channel: Zigbee channel, changing might require re-pairing some devices! (Note: use a ZLL channel: 11, 15, 20, or 25 to avoid problems)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-adapter_concurrent: 适配器并发（例如 CC2531 为 2 或 CC26X2R1 为 16）（默认：null，使用推荐值）
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-cache_state: MQTT message payload will contain all attributes, not only changed ones. Has to be true when integrating via Home Assistant
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-cache_state_persistent: Persist cached state, only used when cache_state: true
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-cache_state_send_on_startup: Send cached state on startup, only used when cache_state: true
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-last_seen: Add a last_seen attribute to MQTT messages, contains date/time of last Zigbee message
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-elapsed: Add an elapsed attribute to MQTT messages, contains milli秒 since the previous msg
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-network_key: 网络 encryption key, changing requires re-pairing all devices!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-transmit_power: Transmit power of adapter, only available for Z-Stack (CC253*/CC2652/CC1352) adapters, CC2652 = 5dbm, CC1352 max is = 20dbm (5dbm default)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-output: Examples when 'state' of a device is published json: topic: 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb' payload '{"state": "ON"}' attribute: topic 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb/state' payload 'ON' attribute_and_json: both json and attribute (see above)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.health: Periodically check the health of Zigbee2MQTT
settingsSchemaDescriptions.health-interval: Interval between checks in 分钟
settingsSchemaDescriptions.health-reset_on_check: If true, will reset stats every time the health check is executed (only applicable to stats that can be reset).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-friendly_name: Used in the MQTT topic of a device. By default this is the device ID
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-retain: Retain MQTT messages of this device
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-disabled: 禁用s the device (excludes device from network scans, availability and group state updates)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-retention: Sets the MQTT Message Expiry in seconds, Make sure to set mqtt.version to 5
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-qos: QoS level for MQTT messages of this device
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-throttle: The minimum time between payloads in seconds. Payloads received whilst the device is being throttled will be discarded
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-debounce_ignore: Protects unique payload values of specified payload properties from overriding within debounce time
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-filtered_attributes: Filter attributes with regex from published payload.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-filtered_cache: Filter attributes with regex from being added to the cache, this prevents the attribute from being in the published payload when the value didn't change.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-filtered_optimistic: Filter attributes with regex from optimistic publish payload when calling /set. (This has no effect if optimistic is set to false).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-icon: The user-defined device icon for the frontend. It can be a full URL link to an image (e.g. https://SOME.SITE/MODEL123.jpg) or a path to a local file inside the `device_icons` directory (e.g. device_icons/MODEL123.png).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-homeassistant-name: Name of the device in Home Assistant
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-group-qos: QoS level for MQTT messages of this group
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-group-off_state: Control when to publish state OFF or CLOSE for a group. 'all_members_off': only publish state OFF/CLOSE when all group members are in state OFF/CLOSE,  'last_member_state': publish state OFF whenever one of its members changes to OFF
